mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_owner.BOARDTBL(B_TITLE,B_CONTENTS,B_ID,B_GRPNO) VALUES(#{b_title},#{b_contents},#{b_id}, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM db_owner.BOARDTBL WHERE B_DEPTH=1 )+1);
mapper.select: SELECT B_IDX, a.B_TITLE, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM db_owner.COMMENTTBL c WHERE c.C_BIDX=a.b_idx )AS B_COMMENTCNT, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM db_owner.BOARDTBL B WHERE 0=0 AND A.B_GRPNO = B.B_GRPNO AND A.B_DEPTH < B.B_DEPTH AND A.B_GRPORD < ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.B_DEPTH !=1 THEN MIN(B_GRPORD) ELSE 7 END FROM db_owner.BOARDTBL C WHERE 0=0 AND B.B_DEPTH=C.B_DEPTH AND B.B_GRPORD < C.B_GRPORD ) ) AS B_RBOARD, B_CONTENTS, B_ID, CONVERT(CHAR(10),B_DATE,23)AS B_DATE , B_GRPNO, B_GRPORD, B_DEPTH FROM db_owner.BOARDTBL a ORDER BY B_GRPNO DESC, B_GRPORD ASC;
SELECT B_IDX , B_TITLE, B_CONTENTS, B_ID, CONVERT(CHAR(10),B_DATE,23)AS B_DATE, B_GRPNO, B_GRPORD, B_DEPTH FROM db_owner.BOARDTBL WHERE B_IDX=#{param};
SELECT COALESCE(MIN(B_GRPORD),0) FROM db_owner.BOARDTBL WHERE B_GRPNO=#{b_grpno} AND B_GRPORD> #{b_grpord} AND #{b_depth}>=B_DEPTH;
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(B_GRPORD),0)+1 FROM db_owner.BOARDTBL WHERE B_GRPNO =#{param};
mapper.update: UPDATE db_owner.BOARDTBL SET B_GRPORD = B_GRPORD+1 WHERE B_GRPNO=#{b_grpno} AND B_GRPORD>=#{selectGrpOrd};
